de.must.wuic
Class RecordSelectTableModel

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      javax.swing.table.DefaultTableModel
          de.must.wuic.MustTableModel
              de.must.wuic.RecordSelectTableModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
Direct Known Subclasses:
TableModelForEditableTables
public class RecordSelectTableModel
extends MustTableModel

A table model with identifiers. May be used to select a row and identify the record by the stored identifier.

See Also:
Serialized Form

addIndexedRowInFirstLine

public void addIndexedRowInFirstLine(java.lang.Object[] visualItems,
                                     Identifier identifier,
                                     int maxRows)
Inserts a new row the model.

Parameters:
visualItems - the cell values if the row
identifier - the identifier to insert
itemIndex - index (position of the identifier to insert)
maxRows - the maximum of rows to be hold in the array - last item will vanish if size > maxRows
